title: Tigi S-factor Smoothing Shampoo and Conditioner DUO (25.36 Oz)
description: Smoothing Shampoo is the first step in achieving soft, radiant hair. This gentle shampoo is enriched with a Pro Vitamin B5 Complex designed to absorb easily into the hair shaft to deeply moisturize and smooth dry, damaged hair. This daily conditioner is a lightweight moisturizer that seals the hair to help tame fly-a-ways and lock in moisture. Vitamin rich Avocado and Jojoba oils nourish the hair beyond the surface for truly brilliant hair. Ideal for coarse, dry hair that tends to frizz.

title: Deva Curl Set it Free 6 oz.
description: Put an end to frizz with this 24-48 hour moisture lock. Adds shine and defines curls with a long lasting hold. Scented with zesty lemon-lime. Not tested on animals. Made in USA.

title: Deva Curl Ultra Creamy Daily Conditioner, One Condition, 32-Ounces
description: Calling all curls. Super Rich - with the invigorating scent of lemon grass. This ultra creamy instant conditioner keeps curls shiny and manageable. For maximum effectiveness use daily. Not tested on animals. Made In USA.
